name: NEXEA
description: At Nexea, we believe technology isn’t just about solving problems—it’s about creating possibilities. Our vision is to merge the brilliance of AI with the warmth of human connection, building a world where your digital companions are as intuitive, reliable, and personal as your closest friends. We’re not just creating tools; we’re crafting experiences. Nexea is a team of lifelike, intelligent AI avatars designed to adapt, learn, and grow with you.
